title: 97/835/EC: Commission Decision of 3 December 1997 amending Decisions 93/24/EEC and 93/244/EEC and concerning additional guarantees relating to Aujeszky's disease for pigs destined for regions free of the disease in Germany (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 3 December 1997 amending Decisions 93/24/EEC and 93/244/EEC and concerning additional guarantees relating to Aujeszky's disease for pigs destined for regions free of the disease in Germany (Text with EEA relevance) (97/835/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. Annex I of Decision 93/24/EC is replaced by Annex I of this Decision.
2. Annex I of Decision 93/244/EEC is replaced by Annex II of this Decision.
This Decision shall apply from 15 December 1997.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 December 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
